<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Lyrakien (Wanderer Azata)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2840)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Lyrakiens are musical messengers and embodiments of free travel. They serve [Desna](/Deities.aspx?ID=281) and other deities and empyreal lords of [Elysium](/Planes.aspx?ID=40) but are quite fond of free time as a fundamental concept and are always on the hunt for opportunities to pause in their duties to enjoy music or appreciate a moment of beauty. They love contests, stories, and songs, and they often challenge mortals to musical contests or pester them to share grand tales of their exploits. Lyrakiens rely on their agility to avoid conflicts, but they do their best to defend places of great natural beauty, especially against foes they can damage with their starlight. Lyrakiens have an innate wanderlust and rarely stay in the same place for very long. Some travel alongside adventurers, often writing songs about their quests and feats of derring-do.

 Though light-hearted creatures, lyrakiens don't let their whimsical personalities get in the way of protecting breathtaking natural locations. Sometimes called “glistenwings” by gnomes and halflings, they are frequently mistaken for [sprites](/Monsters.aspx?ID=389) or similar [fey](/Languages.aspx?ID=119), a bit of confusion that many lyrakiens find amusing and fertile ground for shenanigans involving those they deem deserving of a bit of unexpected fun and discord in their lives.

<trait label="Azata" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=543" />

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 32 <sup>1.1</sup>

[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Diabolic](/Languages.aspx?ID=117), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Empyrean](/Languages.aspx?ID=115)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +6, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +8, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +3
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 25

</row>

**Weaknesses**
[cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 3, unholy 3

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, fly 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 0 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d4–2 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
starlight ray +7 ([Holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517), [Light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100), [range 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d4 spirit

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 17
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171)
- **1st**
[Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160)
- **4th**
[Read Omens](/Spells.aspx?ID=247)
- **Constant (4th)**
[Unfettered Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=1732)

**Starlight Blast** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517), [Light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100)) The lyrakien unleashes a blast of holy starlight in a 5-foot emanation. Enemies in the area take 2d6 spirit damage with a DC 17 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. The lyrakien can't use Starlight Blast or their starlight ray ranged attack for 1d4 rounds.

</column>
